mwb_tgw_talk: Gyidi Ne Amanne a Ɛnsɔ Yehowa Ani No, Nnye Nntom
mwb_tgw_talk_title: 1. Gyidi Ne Amanne a Ɛnsɔ Yehowa Ani No, Nnye Nntom
mwb_ayf_part1: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. To nsa frɛ onipa no ma ommetie ɔkasa titiriw a yebetie no nnansa yi ara no bi. (lmd adesua 2 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part2: AFIE AFIE ASƐNKA. Fa Ɔwɛn-Aban No. 1 2025 no fi nkɔmmɔ ase. Sɛ onipa no de asɛm foforo bɛbom a, dan nkɔmmɔ no kɔ n’asɛm no so. (lmd adesua 3 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part3: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Onipa no aka akyerɛ wo sɛ, ɔko ho asɛm haw no. Fa Ɔwɛn-Aban No. 1 2025 no bi ma no. (lmd adesua 3 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_lc_cbs: lfb ɔfã 4 no nnianim nsɛm, ne adesua 14-15

mwb_ayf_part1: AFIE AFIE. Fa Ɔwɛn-Aban No. 1 2025 no fi nkɔmmɔ ase. (lmd adesua 1 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part3: Ɔkasa. ijwbq asɛm 102—Asɛmti: Kyakyatow—Ɛyɛ Bɔne Anaa? (th adesua 7)
mwb_lc_part1: Ɛnyɛ Asomdwoe Biara Ne Asomdwoe, Enti Ma W’ani Nna Hɔ!—Chibisa Selemani
mwb_lc_part1_title: 7. Ɛnyɛ Asomdwoe Biara Ne Asomdwoe, Enti Ma W’ani Nna Hɔ!—Chibisa Selemani
mwb_lc_part2: Video a yɛato din, Nneɛma a Asafo No Atumi Ayɛ
mwb_lc_part2_title: 8. Video a yɛato din, Nneɛma a Asafo No Atumi Ayɛ

mwb_tgw_talk: Maame Bi De Afotu Pa Maa Ne Ba—Nea Yebetumi Asua Afi Mu
mwb_tgw_talk_title: 1. Maame Bi De Afotu Pa Maa Ne Ba—Nea Yebetumi Asua Afi Mu
mwb_ayf_part1: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Obi aka asɛm bi a ɛtɔ asom anaa wayi ne yam ayɛ biribi. Gyina nea onipa no ayɛ no so ne no mmɔ nkɔmmɔ. (lmd adesua 5 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part2: AFIE AFIE. “Bible Mu Nsɛm a Yɛde Anigye Kyerɛkyerɛ Mu” a ɛwɔ Dɔ Nnipa nhomawa no nkekaho A no, wo ne onipa no mmɔ baako ho nkɔmmɔ. (lmd adesua 1 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_ayf_part3: AFIE AFIE. Da a edi kan a wokɔɔ onipa no nkyɛn no, ogyee Ɔwɛn-Aban No. 1 2025 no bi. To nsa frɛ no ma ommetie ɔkasa titiriw a yebetie no nnansa yi ara no bi. (lmd adesua 7 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_lc_part1: Boa Wo Mma Ma Wɔnhu Sɛnea Wɔde Ɛlɛtrɔnik Mfiri Bɛyɛ Adwuma Yiye
mwb_lc_part1_title: 7. Boa Wo Mma Ma Wɔnhu Sɛnea Wɔde Ɛlɛtrɔnik Mfiri Bɛyɛ Adwuma Yiye

mwb_ayf_part1: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Fa w’ani to fam hwɛ nea onipa no ani gye ho, anaa bisa no ma ɔnkyerɛ. Afei wo ne no nyɛ nhyehyɛe na san kɔ ne nkyɛn. (lmd adesua 3 nkyekyɛm 5)
mwb_ayf_part2: BAGUAM ADANSEDI. “Bible Mu Nsɛm a Yɛde Anigye Kyerɛkyerɛ Mu” a ɛwɔ Dɔ Nnipa nhomawa no nkekaho A no, wo ne onipa no mmɔ baako ho nkɔmmɔ. Fa ho akwankyerɛ a wɔde ama wɔ nkekaho A no nkyekyɛm a edi kan no yɛ adwuma. (lmd adesua 2 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part3: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Bere bi a wo ne onipa no bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ no, obisaa asɛm bi. Wosan kɔ ne nkyɛn anaa wuhyia no a, ma no mmuae. (lmd adesua 9 nkyekyɛm 5)
mwb_ayf_part4: BAGUAM ADANSEDI. Kyerɛ onipa no sɛnea yɛyɛ Bible adesua, na yɛ nhyehyɛe na wo ne no nkɔtoa so. (lmd adesua 10 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_lc_part1: Nneɛma Mmiɛnsa Bi a Ɛho Hia Wɔ Ntetee Ho
mwb_lc_part1_title: 8. Nneɛma Mmiɛnsa Bi a Ɛho Hia Wɔ Ntetee Ho

mwb_tgw_talk: Ahama a Ɛbɔ Ho Mmiɛnsa No, Monhyɛ Mu Den
mwb_tgw_talk_title: 1. Ahama a Ɛbɔ Ho Mmiɛnsa No, Monhyɛ Mu Den
mwb_ayf_part1: AFIE AFIE. Fa Ɔwɛn-Aban No. 1 2025 no fi nkɔmmɔ ase. Sɛ onipa no de asɛm foforo bɛbom a, dan nkɔmmɔ no kɔ n’asɛm no so. (lmd adesua 2 nkyekyɛm 5)
mwb_ayf_part2: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Da a edi kan a wokɔɔ onipa no nkyɛn no, ogyee Ɔwɛn-Aban No. 1 2025 no bi. Ka kyerɛ no sɛ wopɛ wo ne no sua Bible. (lmd adesua 9 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_ayf_part3: lmd nkekaho A nkyekyɛm 12—Asɛmti: Onyankopɔn Nyiyi Nnipa Mu. (th adesua 19)
mwb_lc_part1: Sɛ Mente-Me-Ho-Ase Sɔre Wɔ W’aware Mu a, Fa Yehowa Akwankyerɛ Yɛ Adwuma
mwb_lc_part1_title: 7. Sɛ Mente-Me-Ho-Ase Sɔre Wɔ W’aware Mu a, Fa Yehowa Akwankyerɛ Yɛ Adwuma
mwb_lc_cbs: lfb adesua 22, ɔfã 5 no nnianim nsɛm, ne adesua 23

mwb_tgw_talk: Nea Yɛyɛ a Ɛkyerɛ Sɛ Yɛwɔ Obu Kɛse Ma Yɛn Nyankopɔn Kokuroko No
mwb_tgw_talk_title: 1. Nea Yɛyɛ a Ɛkyerɛ Sɛ Yɛwɔ Obu Kɛse Ma Yɛn Nyankopɔn Kokuroko No
mwb_ayf_part1: AFIE AFIE. Onipa no pɛ sɛ ɔne wo gye akyinnye. (lmd adesua 4 nkyekyɛm 5)
mwb_ayf_part2: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. “Bible Mu Nsɛm a Yɛde Anigye Kyerɛkyerɛ Mu” a ɛwɔ Dɔ Nnipa nhomawa no nkekaho A no, wo ne onipa no mmɔ baako ho nkɔmmɔ. (lmd adesua 1 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part3: AFIE AFIE. Video a ɛka Nnwinnade Titiriw a Yɛde Kyerɛkyerɛ no ho no, ka baako ho asɛm kyerɛ no na wo ne no mmɔ ho nkɔmmɔ. (lmd adesua 7 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part4: lff adesua 17 no nnianim nsɛm ne nkyekyɛm 1-3 (lmd adesua 11 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_lc_part1: “Bible Mu Nsɛm a Yɛde Anigye Kyerɛkyerɛ Mu” No, Wode Reyɛ Adwuma Anaa?
mwb_lc_part1_title: 8. “Bible Mu Nsɛm a Yɛde Anigye Kyerɛkyerɛ Mu” No, Wode Reyɛ Adwuma Anaa?

mwb_ayf_part1: BAGUAM ADANSEDI. Fa w’ani to fam hwɛ nea onipa no ani gye ho, anaa bisa no ma ɔnkyerɛ. Afei wo ne no nyɛ nhyehyɛe a wobɛsan de akɔ ne nkyɛn. (lmd adesua 2 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_ayf_part2: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. (lmd adesua 2 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part3: AFIE AFIE. Ka yɛn wɛbsaet, jw.org no ho asɛm kyerɛ no. (lmd adesua 9 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_ayf_part4: Ɔyɛkyerɛ. ijwfq asɛm 50—Asɛmti: Sɛn Na Adansefo Yɛ Wɔn Ayi? (th adesua 17)
mwb_lc_part1: Nya Gyidi Paa Sɛ Owusɔre No Bɛba
mwb_lc_part1_title: 8. Nya Gyidi Paa Sɛ Owusɔre No Bɛba

mwb_tgw_talk: Ɔhaw Ahorow a Worefa Mu No, Kɔ So Nya Ho Adwempa
mwb_tgw_talk_title: 1. Ɔhaw Ahorow a Worefa Mu No, Kɔ So Nya Ho Adwempa
mwb_ayf_part1: BAGUAM ADANSEDI. Fa no sɛ woahyia obi a n’anim ayɛ bosaa. Wo ne no mfi ase mmɔ nkɔmmɔ. (lmd adesua 3 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_ayf_part2: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Onipa no aka akyerɛ wo sɛ ɔman no sikasɛm agyaw no adwinnwen. “Bible Mu Nsɛm a Yɛde Anigye Kyerɛkyerɛ Mu” a ɛwɔ Dɔ Nnipa nhomawa no nkekaho A no, wo ne no mmɔ baako ho nkɔmmɔ. (lmd adesua 4 nkyekyɛm 4)
mwb_ayf_part3: lff adesua 17 no afã a yɛato din, nea yɛasua, ntimu, ne fa wei si w’ani so. (lmd adesua 12 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_lc_part1: Sɛ Awerɛhosɛm Bi To Wo a, Yehowa Bɛboa Wo
mwb_lc_part1_title: 7. Sɛ Awerɛhosɛm Bi To Wo a, Yehowa Bɛboa Wo
mwb_lc_cbs: lfb adesua 28, ɔfã 6 no nnianim nsɛm, ne adesua 29

mwb_tgw_talk: Hwɛ W’apɔwmuden Yiye, Na Ama W’ani Agye Wɔ Asetenam
mwb_tgw_talk_title: 1. Hwɛ W’apɔwmuden Yiye, Na Ama W’ani Agye Wɔ Asetenam
mwb_ayf_part2: BERE A WUNNI ASƐNKA MU. Fa no sɛ bere bi a wo ne fiewura no bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ ne biribi awu nnansa yi ara. (lmd adesua 9 nkyekyɛm 3)
mwb_ayf_part3: lmd nkekaho A nkyekyɛm 13—Asɛmti: Onyankopɔn Pɛ Sɛ Ɔboa Yɛn. (th adesua 20)
